highlights: Designing and building a dashboard that displays information about the status of various supercomputer resources using Ruby and Ruby on Rails.
Write and publish various features and bug fixes for OpenOndemand, an open-source web platform enabling researchers to interface with powerful linux supercomputers through a web interface.
Created the MongoDB database, Express.js API, and connecting client code for monkeytype.com, which serves over 100k unique users every day.
Identified and corrected inefficient processes, immediately reducing costs by 70 percent and slowing the rate of increasing cloud service costs.
Collaborated with the lead developer and a more experienced professional to ensure a smooth deployment.

projects.name: mathgenerator
projects.description: Created and maintain an open-source python package that enables generating a wide variety of math exercises. Featured on Hacker News, reaching rank 5. Has over 500 stars on Github.

projects.name: Stem Player Online
projects.description: Created a web application that enables users to manipulate music in a way similar to the popular Stem Player device. Used by around 3000 people per month.

projects.name: Regilo
projects.description: Created a desktop application that allows users to control their computer with a custom controller on their phone. Uses an http and websocket server in C/C++ for maximum performance.

projects.name: 3cards
projects.description: Created a web3 application that allows users to create and share flashcard sets at 0 cost. Powered by Arweave, a decentralized blockchain-like storage network. Winner in the Arweave Open Web Hackathon.
Created a website to help people store, share, search, discuss, vote on, and manage their ideas.
projects.name: Ideaspot
Congol
projects.description: Created a website that allows users to play a version of Conway's Game of Life with 2 players competing live over the internet.

projects.name: Recolorbot
projects.description: Created a Reddit bot that colors black and white images using an AI image coloring API. Bot has colored images from over 200 posts.

projects.name: Flag Quiz
projects.description: Created a flutter app where users can test their knowledge of national flags.

volunteer.organization: Competitive Programming Club at Ohio State
highlights: Work with team to plan weekly meetings and events, creating educational content for club members.
Lead efforts to acquire funding for the club and its various events.
